summary: This is a small mod and adds Alduin as your best friend.
descriptionHtml:
Update:
Version:0.2
-Alduin height was changed from 0.4 to 0.3.
-Alduin now have dragon bones,scales and leather strips in his inventory,i add it for crafting dragon armors and weapons(for weapons you need dawnguard DLC),but you need ebony ingots for it,dont worry,you can buy it from Alvor or another blacksmither.
-Minor bug fixes.
Requirements:
Skyrim version:1.9.32
About mod and istallation:This mod add,Alduin as a companion follower.You can find Alduin on Riverwood entrance.This mod is in beta version,so it have a lot of bugs,i will try to fix but i dont have a lot of time because of school and im beginner for creating mods (this is my first mod).For Alduin as follower i remove some things,like firestorm shout and armor you can break only with dragonrend because i wont to make him too strong.I give them male argonian voice because Alduin original voice wont work.I will trying to fixing bugs a soon i can.This mod is compatible with other Alduin retexture mods.Now about installation,is very simple just extract AlduinFollowerBeta.esp to your Skyrim data folder and you can enjoying Skyrim with this mod.Sorry for my bad english.
author: Sahrotaar_74
